verses.verse: A Psalm of David, when he fled from Absalom his son. <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, how are mine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H7231>increased<s%>! <S%H7227>Many<s%> are they that rise up against <S%H6965>me<s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> there are that <S%H559>say<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, There is no <S%H3444>help<s%> for him in <S%H430>God<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
But <S%H3068>thou<s%>, O Jehovah, art a <S%H4043>shield<s%> about <S%H3519>me<s%>; My glory and the lifter <S%H7311>up<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>.
I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, And he <S%H6030>answereth<s%> me out of his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%>. <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
I laid me <S%H7901>down<s%> and <S%H3462>slept<s%>; I <S%H6974>awaked<s%>; For <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> sustaineth <S%H5564>me<s%>.
I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> That have <S%H7896>set<s%> themselves against me round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O my God: For thou hast <S%H5221>smitten<s%> all mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> upon the cheek <S%H3895>bone<s%>; Thou hast <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Salvation <S%H3444><s%> belongeth unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Thy <S%H1293>blessing<s%> be upon thy <S%H5971>people<s%>. <S%H5542>[Selah<s%>]
